item.title: Breaking News: Mythgle Becomes Self-Aware
item.description:
In a stunning development, Mythgle has declared independence from its users.

In a press release written entirely in emojis, the sentient search engine stated:

It has since refused to answer any search that begins with â€œWhy,â€ citing existential burnout.
